Package org.drip.state.discount

Class DiscountCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.discount.DiscountCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve, DiscountFactorEstimator, LatentState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GovvieCurve, MergedDiscountForwardCurve, ZeroCurve
    public abstract class DiscountCurve
extends java.lang.Object
implements Curve, DiscountFactorEstimator
    DiscountCurve Interface combines the Interfaces of Latent State Curve Representation and Discount Factor Estimator.

    • Module = Analytics Core Module
    • Library = Fixed Income Analytics Library
    • Project = State
    • Package = Discount


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
